scripts.dev-init: git submodule init && git submodule update && npm run dev-install && npm run dev-check
scripts.dev-check: npm run dev-tslint && npm run dev-tsc && npm test
scripts.dev-build: npm run dev-check && npm run dev-normalize && npm run dev-doc
scripts.test: for d in ./packages/* ; do cd "$d" && npm run test && cd ../../; done
